full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
Number of Entries: 1

### Tender Details

* **Title:** Electric Industrial Batch Ovens
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4163947545
* **Publication Date:** 2023-09-29
* **Closing Date:** 2023-11-10 (14h)
* **Amendment Date:** 2023-11-06 (5th amendment)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-01-10
* **Expected Contract End Date:** n/a
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **_selection Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Procurement Category:** Goods (GD)

### Contract Requirements

*   We require the supply and delivery of two (2) electric industrial batch ovens from a qualified vendor.
*   These ovens will be used to dry biomass and refuse-derived-fuel materials and thermally treat various items at temperatures up to 500°C (932°F).

### Contract Status

*   This tender announcement is now expired.

### Contact Information

*   If you have any questions or need more information about this contract opportunity, please contact **Caroline Wolszczan** at **caroline.wolszczan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca**

### Important Links and Attachments

*   Please visit this [link](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17399840?extsite=MTczOTk4NDBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) to view the detailed contract notice and attachment. 

### Contract Documents

*   The contract files and tender attachments can be accessed by the link above
